scripts.prepare:optimism: ts-node bin/build-subgraph.ts optimism && bun run codegen
scripts.prepare:arbitrum-one: ts-node bin/build-subgraph.ts arbitrum-one && bun run codegen
scripts.prepare:polygon: ts-node bin/build-subgraph.ts matic && bun run codegen
scripts.prepare:base: ts-node bin/build-subgraph.ts base && bun run codegen
scripts.deploy:optimism: bun run prepare:optimism && graph deploy olive-optimism
scripts.deploy:arbitrum-one: bun run prepare:arbitrum-one && graph deploy olive-arbitrum
scripts.deploy:polygon: bun run prepare:polygon && graph deploy olive-polygon
scripts.deploy:base: bun run prepare:base && graph deploy olive-base
